intro: Psychotria irosinensis, commonly known as the Irosin psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Costa Rica and Panama. The plant is characterized by its small, green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It often grows in shaded, humid environments within tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
